PARAMS.TITLE: Java Script Apps
PARAMS.DESCRIPTION: Description : Checks if the given input is a prime number.
PARAMS.BACKGROUND: Background : A number whose factors are 1 and itself is a Prime Number. As 1 is a trivial factor we are not giving it in the result.

PARAMS.TITLE: Java Script Apps
PARAMS.DESCRIPTION: Description : Lists the prime factors of the input number
PARAMS.BACKGROUND: Background : A prime factor of an integer is a prime number that divides the integer exactly. As 1 is a trivial factor we are not giving it in the result.

PARAMS.TITLE: Java Script Apps
PARAMS.DESCRIPTION: Description : Lists the divisors of the input number
PARAMS.BACKGROUND: Background : A divisor of an integer is a number that divides the integer exactly

PARAMS.TITLE: Java Script Apps
PARAMS.DESCRIPTION: Description : Return the sum of the divisors of the input number
PARAMS.BACKGROUND: Background : A divisor of an integer is a number that divides the integer exactly.Sum of divisors is also called as divisor sigma
